AudaciousBovine.MalignantSplashes.enable: Makes Dark Splashes Malignantly cling to your hull unable to be discarded, a shipyard can remove them for a cost.
AudaciousBovine.MalignantSplashes.unmova: Prevents Dark Splashes from being moved around the hull or into storage making them even more of a problem.
AudaciousBovine.MalignantSplashes.splash: (NOT IMPLEMENTED) Percentage of panic increase per Dark Splash clinging to the hull.
The cost to remove a Dark Splash from your hull.
(NOT IMPLEMENTED) The amount you receive when selling a Dark Splash to someone that cares to buy them.
